overview: Fresh from the triple success of the "Loose Ends" series, master director Bruce Seven deals a winning hand by delivering his grandest and nastiest all-girl epic, Hard Rockin' Babes! This throbbing, thumping, XXX-Rated dance sexathon features Porn's wettest and certifiably most awesome women - Erica Boyer, Sharon Mitchell, Porsche Lynn, Stephanie Rage, Sharon Kane and Blondie. So hold on tight as these babes get into the groove, lickin' up a storm and makin' everything wet 'n warm! Would Bruce Seven let you down?
title: Hard Rocking Babes
